Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Analyzing the sequence of events for Case A1 and Case B2 to identify similarities and extract a general pattern for grouping.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Determining that the first five activities (retrieving, scanning, placing, aligning, preheating) are preparatory steps focused on getting the material ready, which form a coherent 'Material Preparation' step.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Recognizing that picking up the welding tool and welding actions (welding corners A and B) are part of the 'Assembly' step, as they are logically connected and performed by the same operator.

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Inferring from the use of quality sensors that 'Measure weld integrity' constitutes a distinct 'Quality Inspection' step for ensuring the accuracy of the weld.

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Grouping 'Apply protective coating' and 'Dry coating' as part of the 'Finishing' step due to their focus on surface treatment and completion of the product.

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Concluding that the 'Visual check' is a distinct 'Final Quality Assurance' step based on its role as a final inspection by a different operator (Operator C).

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Cross-referencing resource involvement and temporal proximity to confirm the logical flow and separation of high-level steps into 'Material Preparation,' 'Assembly,' 'Quality Inspection,' 'Finishing,' and 'Final Quality Assurance.'
